https://tmrev.io/movie/494583-After-Work Beer 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gq2PB9QsP8oluKAUnc0nHsRD6rJ.jpg Magnus once had a girlfriend and a kid. But his girlfriend now has somebody new. And so now Magnus has his classic car, and a bar. Everything about Magnus’ manner makes him a hipster – par excellence. He has a couple of close friends, all cut from the same cloth. But then one night his car is stolen and Magnus falls into a kind of cultivated despair. After-Work Beer
